Description: Gorgeous Charles River views from this bright and spacious 2 bed/1 bath at The Charles View! The unit features central heat and a/c, hardwood floors and a functional floor plan. The building is professionally managed with a concierge and an elevator. Enjoy incredible sunsets over The Charles River with water views from very room! The galley kitchen has a dishwasher, common laundry is in the building. Convenient location nestled between Back Bay and Kenmore Square.
